lines.text: If, for some reason your life functions ceased, my most precious one, I would collapse, I would draw the shades and I would live in the dark. I would never get out of my slar pad or clean myself. My fluids would coagulate, my cone would shrivel, and I would die, miserable and lonely. The stench would be great.
[repeated line]
Therefore, you will... NARFTLE THE GARTHOK!
May I have 55 words with you?
H... hi, Mr. Conehead.

[Peels back the roof of Ronnie's car]
I find you unacceptable!
Yes, sir!
If I did not fear incarceration from human authority figures, I would terminate your life functions by applying sufficient pressure to your blunt skull so as to force its collapse!

[Beldar replaces the roof in its original position and walks away]
Th... thank you.

How can it take so long to do a simple alignment on an american sedan with standard rack-and-pinion steering and MacPherson struts When your garage is equipped with the proper Borg-Warner digital hydraulic radiometer?
Maybe because I was out back finishing a beer.
[Connie gulps down an entire sub sandwich]

[impressed]
Wow! My Mom's the only other woman I know who can take a sandwich like that!

[pointing at Ronnie's sub]
You going to finish that?
If they are in fact aliens from another planet, sir, doesn't that make them Airforce jurisdiction?
If they're just visiting, sure. But the minute they try to work here, they're mine.
Take my car, its re-enforced alloy superstructure is far superior to that of your broken down, rusted out shit box.
When my people come to colonize this planet, your name will be on the protected rolls, and you will come to no harm.
You are wise. But there's a sadness to your wisdom.
Hey Beldar, got any more of that gum?
Certainly.
[hands him a wrapped condom]
On second thought, I better not chew and drive.

[to Connie after they return to Earth]
Your positive perception of me is vital to my existence. Besides, it is not everyday a father can give the world to his child.

[Furious to be kept waiting over his car repair]
What choice do I have? It is as if you have grabbed me by the base of my snarglies!
I have learned much from watching the Garthok battle. It has weaknesses. I believe I can take it.
Uh-huh. And let me know when Elvis gets here.
All men are pigs.
Ah, pigs. An omnivorous domesticated cloven-hooved vertebrate that defecates in the same place it consumes.
Exactly.
He was behaving like a flarndip?

[Confused]
Flarndip?
A masher, a hustler, an uninvited grasper of cone.

[Overhears this and is irate]
FLARNDIP?

I was a young cone myself once. Before I met Beldar, I was very attracted to a young Thorasian forger. And I far as I was concerned there was no other life force in the universe that mattered. But then he got a job working at a volcano complex on some moon in the Petulaus Cluster. I never saw him again. And it broke my blood valve chamber.
An owner's manual to a Ford Lincoln Mercury Sable.
Ford Lincoln Mercury Sable?
A personal conveyance named after its inventor, an assassinated ruler, a character from Greco-Roman myth and a small fur-covered mammal.
Ah.
Pretty cheap, Conehead.
Hey buddy, what's with the head?
Ah forget him, he's not a member.
You know Connie, I read in a magazine that you can talk to me about anything.
Hello Mr. De-Sick-o.
DeChicco, my name is DeChicco.
Let it be written... are you writing this?
Are you telling me you don't have a social security number?
Correct.
Why not?
I am an illegal alien.
I think I'll have some Tang.
Ah Tang, the drink astronauts took to the moon.
Astronauts to the moon?
[Beldar and Prymatt laugh]
Yeah, my grandfather's from the "Old Country".
Oh really, which one?
I'm not sure. One of the big ones.
When the High Master hears of the destruction of our ship, he will be most displeased.
Affirmative. He will surely cut off my plargh and hand it to me.
Uuuugh!

[Spotting a tattoo on Connie's head]
What have you done to your cone?
Nothing?
No? Turn around!
[turns her head]
NYAAAHH!
Ehhhh! It's not a real tattoo.
Mebs! Mebs! Unacceptable!
It's just a decal; everyone's wearing them.
If everyone jumped into a bituminous cauldron, would you jump in too?
I am not a little cone anymore, Dad!
Maintain low tones with me! Maintain low tones! Now, you are to go to the hygenic chamber and remove it! Also, you are wearing far too much lip and cheek enhancement.
Mom - ! My makeup looks okay, doesn't it?

Do not involve the approval of your other parental unit. Now, if you wish to accompany me to the enclosed retail compound, you will go to the hygenic chamber upstairs immediately, and REMOVE THE DECAL!

[Catching Ronnie and Connie together]
NYAAAAHHH! Senso-rings? Where did you get those?
Under your bed?
Unacceptable! Your cone is too young!
You will survey Underlord Beldar Corhon and Marlax Zanthstram from Frodoit-fuel Adminstration.
